_sText:
V2 is on its way! v2 will include these new features-
Heaven soundscapes
Hell soundscapes
"Forever walls" in Heaven, as if the level never has a boundary
Music in the waiting room
More cover in Heaven, perhaps even a floor fog.
More brushes will be added, to create more realistic level features.
More gore/dead bodies/freaky crap in Hell (RAGDOLLS to play with)
Maybe I'll also make Hell more "Cavernous..." finish reshaping the floors and ceilings as well.
v2 will be released soon, within the next week or two.

This is my first map, and I am very proud of it. It's a pretty large file, though, so it's probably played best at a LAN party. (15.9 Mb, maximum download size) Dedicated Servers may have trouble distributing this load. Otherwise, this is a great map, and I'll just copy and paste the In-Game description for you to read-


The doors to heaven and hell have been opened, and some extremist retards
have entered into the realm of the suffering to establish a base of operations.
From there, they plan to perturb the big man himself, God, by blowing up his
throne. They know that the masonry and metallurgy required to rebuild the seat
of God could take a few days, maybe even weeks, to repair! God, being omnipresent,
obviously knows of this attack, and has hired some elite counter-terrorist units
from the human world to prevent this. And while they're at it, they can do
their best to save some souls from the underworld, if possible.

CTs- Kill those terrorists. if possible, attempt to save some souls from hell,
they could use some relief.

Terrorists- Blow up the throne of God, and escape!

Mapped by Ben
finished Jan. 25, 2008
Jagpanther777@yahoo.com


Go JESUS! This one's for you!
